title: I wnt to join a ranked team
body:
Hi I really want to join a ranked team. I am currently bronze 2. I can play any role except top lane and my favourite role to go is support(thresh).
Please if you want me to join your team please send me a friend request and i'll add you. I'm allowed on league of legends each weekday from 7-9 or earlier. On weekends I play randomly.
